Description copied from interface: ObservationDao

IllegalArgumentException - if Entities are not found in the database.

getNewestObservations

public List<Observation> getNewestObservations(int count)
Description copied from interface: ObservationDao
Query for the newest Observations. If less then count Observations are available all Observations will be returned.

Specified by:
getNewestObservations in interface ObservationDao
Parameters:
count - specifies how many Observations will be returned.
Returns:
count or less Observations; orderd by their creationDate
See Also:
Observation.getCreationDate()
